enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Sophomores, Juniors, and Seniors from every undergraduate school only.
title: SoC COMM_ST 395-0-21 Topics in Communication Studies

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course will familiarize students with the major topics, concepts, theories, and research studies that comprise the integrated body of literature on health and interpersonal communication. Major topics will include (a) experiencing illness, (b) social support from family, friends, and peers, (c) the influence of technology on interpersonal health communication, and (d) provider-patient communication. This course emphasizes students' active engagement and practical application of health communication theory in interpersonal contexts.

subject: COMM_ST
